thread.title: Colton Haynes Dating Celebrity Florist Jeff Leatham!
thread.title_full: Colton Haynes Dating Celebrity Florist Jeff Leatham!

author: Just Jared
title: Colton Haynes Dating Celebrity Florist Jeff Leatham!
text:
Colton Haynes has a sexy, new man in his life!
The 28-year-old former Teen Wolf actor took to Instagram to confirm that he is dating florist-to-the-stars Jeff Leatham .
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Colton Haynes 
“It’s not every day that someone comes into your life & makes you want to be a better man. I feel so blessed to be by your side @jeffleatham ❤️❤️❤️#WhatMoviesAreMadeOf,” Colton captioned the below selfie of himself shirtless in bed with Jeff .
Jeff is already a well-known name in Hollywood.
Last weekend during the Grammys, Lady Gaga shared a picture of herself with Adele posing with a arrangement of flowers by Jeff !
Last year, Colton emotionally opened up for the first time about suffering from anxiety before coming out as a gay.
A post shared by Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) on Feb 19, 2017 at 10:01pm PST 

Check out more Instagram posts from Colton Haynes & Jeff Leatham’s romantic Valentine’s Day… 
Huge Congratulations to the ultra talented @adele for all her amazing #Grammy wins this evening so proud of her and so #Inspired 🙌🏼🙌🏼🙌🏼❤️❤️❤️- and the beautiful @ladygaga for her amazing performance – #Queens !!! with #TeamLeatham Blooms #Honored – #Repost @ladygaga ・・・ This one 👸❤🤘killin it tonight like girls do 
A post shared by JeffLeatham (@jeffleatham) on Feb 12, 2017 at 8:57pm PST 
The most special day of my life. Thank you @jeffleatham . We were actually in the clouds…speechless. Happy Valentine's Day to all of you. #LoveWins ❤️❤️❤️ Never be afraid to love harder. 
A post shared by Colton Haynes (@coltonlhaynes) on Feb 14, 2017 at 9:40pm PST 
Valentine's – Real Life – Love ☁️☁️☁️❤❤❤- Celebrate Love -❤❤ 
A post shared by JeffLeatham (@jeffleatham) on Feb 14, 2017 at 10:30pm PST
